    • getOverStockedIngredients

      public ArrayList<Integer> getOverStockedIngredients(Timestamp start, Timestamp end)
      Retrieves an ArrayList of ingredient IDs that are overstocked, based on the usage of ingredients over a specified period of time with a threshold of 10%.
      Parameters:
      start - the start time of the period over which to calculate ingredient usage
      end - the end time of the period over which to calculate ingredient usage
      Returns:
      a list of ingredient IDs that are overstocked, in ArrayList format

    • getOverStockedIngredients

      public ArrayList<Integer> getOverStockedIngredients(Timestamp start, Timestamp end, double threshold)
      Retrieves an ArrayList of ingredient IDs that are overstocked, based on the usage of ingredients over a specified period of time and a specified threshold.
      Parameters:
      start - the start time of the period over which to calculate ingredient usage
      end - the end time of the period over which to calculate ingredient usage
      threshold - the threshold at which an ingredient is considered overstocked
      Returns:
      a list of ingredient IDs that are overstocked, in ArrayList format
